item.title: Between Scylla and Charybdis: Neoliberalism in Algeria?
item.description: Exordium potentially change this picture with the one I got from suq in sidi okba as it might be more relevant and more interesting A Financial Times article1 from June 14, 2021 titled “Algeria on the brink as pandemic and low oil price take their toll” caught my eye the other day. As I read on, I was struck by a sense of disquietude both at the implications of the article and at my benighted state regarding the history and trajectory of the country.
